channel.title: The Arena. - Will Release When Finished
channel.description:
[b]WHATS THE PLAN?[/b]
Basically just thought of an amazing idea for a server that im going to get to work on right away. Your a prisoner who has been captured and you are "forced" to fight npc's and players in two seperate arenas, the NPC arena and the PVP arena.
The NPC arena will be the only way to train and there will be a series of teleports that teleport you onto the next stage of npc's (gaining levels until the final boss)
The PVP arena will reward players with points that they will be able to buy especially PVP gear with.
The shops will also only allow you to trade them if you have a certain NPC point amount.. EG the starter gear guy sells full iron for you to kill goblins, while the second guy gives you dragon and soforth.
There will also be an NPC point shop that you will be able to buy showoff gear with (eg partyhats) but there will also be combat items included.
This will provide interest for both NVP players and PVP players, and force all players to try out both sides, as they have to train and they have to get good weapons from the pvp point shop.
The home will have to be some kind of a place that loos like a prison with lots of room and areas for stalls.. (Thinking of making randoms on stalls so you get a certain item dependant on random)
As i said before ill get started now and post pics ASAP.
[b]WHAT IVE DONE SO FAR:[/b]
[code] Found a home added requirements and money to the stalls Made a stall give randoms Added some globalobjects Added perfect range + melle follow [/code]
[b]WHAT I NEED TO DO:[/b]
[code]
1) find a home and add stuff to it to make it more.. homey a) make stalls give randoms b) make stalls theiveable
2) add npcs and whatevers gunna tele em
3) make pvp area
4) make arena points (nvp) a) make shops require points to talk to them b) make a arena point shop
5) make arena system a) find area b) add npc's c) make npc's add points[/code]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/ipa3q1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2zrjdie.png[/img]
Range following
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/qzi52c.gif[/img]
Melle following
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/211ugas.jpg[/img]

item.title: The Arena. - Will Release When Finished
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:34, topic:317617”][quote author=DemisePking link=topic=414127.msg3051060#msg3051060 date=1260091145]

Your pictures suck hard, this idea is gay. I don’t think anyone would want to play this when they can just PK.

who said anything about playing, i just make servers for fun[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2009, 02:51:18 pm[/size][hr]and why do my pictures suck hard other than you want some pathetic attention to suffice your sad little mind?

They suck hard because anyone can do anything that you did in your pictures. If you just make servers for fun, then why do you release?

so people can mess around with the code and have fun?

Why would they want to mess around with a barely edited delta?

ask 7.8k total downloads

lolololl @ 7.8k downloads

CONFUCKINGRADULATIONS MAN@!!! u must feel proud, 7k noobs downloaded shit they think is cool, awesome. SUPERB even.

lol. only saying it because he said no one would download my servers.
tbh im actually completely fine with noobs downloading my stuff. I hope they learn.
[/quote]

You get a delta and you put 698690808 customs in it so noobs think it looks cool. You still need to learn. If you posted on roon serba you would get 3 downloads max.[/quote]

Lol? i did put one of my servers on runeserver and it had 730 downloads last time i checked… Also i almost NEVER use customs on my servers apart from actual runescape items.

Read full topic

Range following isn’t perfect , its not 100% and dds isn’t 100% perfect hit nummber 2 needs to pop up a little slower.
[/quote]

tbh im fine with the dds spec appearing 1 millisecond later then your “perfect” hits and why isnt range following perfect?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2009, 07:26:35 am[/size][hr][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=414127.msg3049786#msg3049786 date=1260019158]
Did you get the idea from World of Warcraft?
[/quote]

no :P… i got it from death race kind of[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2009, 11:24:22 am[/size][hr][quote author=Deathspirit link=topic=414127.msg3049728#msg3049728 date=1260014189]
Looks good actualy but if the home is wilderniss new players get attacked right?
[/quote]

the home isnt actually wilderness… ive changed that but cba to update pics :O[/quote]
The range following isn’t the perfect one because if the player don’t stop running it won’t follow it try it out.

item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:11, topic:317617”][quote author=DemisePking link=topic=414127.msg3050048#msg3050048 date=1260036414]

Here we go again. An easy server to make, and of course, with a delta. I don’t think you’re able to do any better.

Im not sure its delta actually… the combat system is waaaayyy different and there isnt wilderness ;).

It’s delta. That’s the only thing you work with because you can’t do anything better. You say on every server 'perfacttttt dds spac!!!" when you edited a timer once and then did it on your next server, so it’s nothing knew. All you do is follow tutorials. Your ‘arena points’ are gay because all you do is edit a pk points method. All you are doing is making wilderness and adding points. Wow, a pk server based around an arena.

nope… read a bit please baby

you forget NvP my loveable munchkin friend
[/quote]

Oh I’m sorry… You add NPCs around too… Happy?[/quote]
